definitions.definition: The act or art of coloring .
A notational device for indicating hemiola through either use of red ink (in mensural black notation) or black noteheads (in mensural white notation).
Ornamental division (also called passaggi , glosas , diminutions . etc.) employing rapid black notes .
This when a consonant bleeds one of the qualities to the next vowel before the consonant disappears. This can describe PIE Laryngeal Theory .
labels: Can we clean up this sense?
label_groups: Can we clean up this sense?

main_definition: The act or art of coloring .

( linguistics ) (Can we clean up this sense?) This when a consonant bleeds one of the qualities to the next vowel before the consonant disappears. This can describe PIE Laryngeal Theory .
